STRATOVARIUS Infinite (2000 German Limited Edition 11-track Double CD album, featuring a bonus disc with two extra tracks and CD_Rom bonus material. 'Infinite' was a real milestone in the Melodic Power Metal scene. From the catchy opener 'Hunting High And Low', filled with fantastic rhythm guitar parts, harmonious vocals and a bright shining drive, to 'Celestial Dream', built upon a soaring symphonic and orchestral setting this album is powerful, dynamic, atmospheric and captivating from the first to the last second. Includes the singles 'Hunting High and Low', 'It's a Mystery' & 'A Million Light Years Away'. Housed in jewel case with booklet picture sleeve and outer slipcase with tour dates sticker NB464-2)

TRACKLISTING AND EXTRA INFORMATION

1. Hunting High And Low

2. Millennium

3. Mother Gaia

4. Phoenix

5. Glory Of The World

6. Million Light Years Away

7. Freedom

8. Infinity

9. Celestial Dream

10. Why Are We Here - Bonus

11. It's A Mystery - Bonus
